import AdminCustomerActionbar from "./AdminCustomerActionbar/AdminCustomerActionbar"; import { Form, Field, Formik } from "formik"; import './admin-customers.css' import { createRef, useRef } from "react"; export default function AdminCustomers() { //XXX ref in loop const couponsRef = useRef([]) const things = ['sadefzdf', 'ertcvbxa', 'erzfgf', 'nvioeznrf'] couponsRef.current = things.map((element, i) => couponsRef.current[i] ?? createRef()); console.log(couponsRef) return (
{({ values }) => (<>
< td >
ID First Name Last Name Email Password
)}
) }
